GR12hsasvrpu:0: Viṣayasūcī by K.K. Dixit (verse numbers bracketed)
GR12hsasvrpu:5: 1.3 maiṃ viṣayaka pratyakṣa anubhava se ātmā kī siddhi (79-87)
GR12hsasvrpu:6: 1.4 ātmā tathā karma ke saṃbaṃdha meṃ matamatāntara (88-109)
GR12hsasvrpu:9: 2.1 puṇya, pāpa tathā mokṣa se saṃbaṃdhita kuccha praśna (113-163)
GR12hsasvrpu:19: 4.2 bhāva abhāva bana jātā hai isa mata kā khaṃḍana (248-275)
GR12hsasvrpu:20: 4.3 abhāva bhāva bana jātā hai isa mata kā khaṃḍana (276-302)
GR12hsasvrpu:24: 4.7 buddhavacanoṃ kī sahāyatā se kṣaṇikavāda kā khaṃḍana (360-374)
GR12hsasvrpu:29: 6.1 nirhetuka vināśa se kṣaṇikavāda kī siddhi nahīṃ (414-436)
GR12hsasvrpu:30: 6.2 arthakriyākāritva se kṣaṇikavāda kī siddhi nahīṃ (437-443)
GR12hsasvrpu:31: 6.3 rūparūpāntaraṇa se kṣaṇikavāda kī siddhi nārthīṃ (444-450)
GR12hsasvrpu:32: 6.4 antatogāmī nāśa se kṣaṇikavāda kī siddhi nahīṃ (451-463)
GR12hsasvrpu:33: 6.5 kṣaṇikavāda tathā vijñānadvaitavāda ke pratipādana kā eka āśayaviśeṣa (464-466)
GR12hsasvrpu:40: 9.1 mokṣa kī saṃbhāvanā tathā mokṣa ke sādhana (553-579)
GR12hsasvrpu:46: 11.2 jñāna tathā kiryā ke bīca prādhānya-aprādhānya kā praśna (673-691)
GR12hsasvrpu:55: duḥkhaṃ pāpāt sukhaṃ dharmāt sarvaśāstreṣu saṃsthitiḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:56: na kartavyam ataḥ pāpaṃ kartavyo dharmasaṃcayaḥ // HSvs_[1.1]3 //
GR12hsasvrpu:58: krodhādayaś ca catvāra iti pāpasya hetavaḥ // HSvs_[1.1]4 //
GR12hsasvrpu:60: eteṣu satataṃ yatnaḥ samyak kāryaḥ sukhaiṣiṇā // HSvs_[1.1]5 //
GR12hsasvrpu:61: sādhusevā sadā bhaktyā maitrī sattveṣu bhāvataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:64: sthāne vinaya ityetat sādhusevāphalaṃ mahat // HSvs_[1.1]7 //
GR12hsasvrpu:65: maitrīṃ bhāvayato nityaṃ śubho bhāvaḥ prajāyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:70: tattvaviddhiḥ samākhyātaḥ samyag dharmasya sādhakaḥ // HSvs_[1.1]10 //
GR12hsasvrpu:71: upādeyaś ca saṃsāre dharma eva buddhaiḥ sadā /
GR12hsasvrpu:72: viśuddho muktaye sarvaṃ yato 'nyad duḥkhakāraṇam // HSvs_[1.1]11 //
GR12hsasvrpu:78: punaḥ punaś ca yad ataḥ sukham atra na vidyate // HSvs_[1.1]14 //
GR12hsasvrpu:79: prakṛtyasundaraṃ hy evaṃ saṃsāre sarvam eva yat /
GR12hsasvrpu:80: ato 'tra vada kiṃ yuktā kvacidāsthā vivekinām // HSvs_[1.1]15 //
GR12hsasvrpu:81: muktvā dharmaṃ jagad vandyam akalaṅkaṃ sanātanam /
GR12hsasvrpu:83: āha tatrāpi no yuktā yadi samyag nirūpyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:84: dharmasyāpi śubho yasmād bandha eva phalaṃ matam // HSvs_[1.1]17 //
GR12hsasvrpu:85: na cāyasasya bandhasya tadā hemamayasya ca /
GR12hsasvrpu:87: tasmād adharmavat tvājyo dharmo 'py evaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:88: dharmādharmakṣayānm uktir munibhir varṇitā yataḥ // HSvs_[1.1]19 //
GR12hsasvrpu:89: ucyate evam evaitat kintu dharmo dvidhā mataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:92: abhyāsātiśayād uktaṃ tad vimukteḥ prasādhanam // HSvs_[1.1]21 //
GR12hsasvrpu:93: dharmas tadapi cet satyaṃ kiṃ na bandhaphalaḥ sa yat /
GR12hsasvrpu:94: āśaṃsā varjito 'nyo 'pi kiṃ naivaṃ ced na yat tathā // HSvs_[1.1]22 //
GR12hsasvrpu:96: samyagmithyādirūpaś ca gatis tantrāntareṣv api // HSvs_[1.1]23 //
GR12hsasvrpu:97: tam antareṇa tu tayoḥ kṣayaḥ kena prasādhyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:98: sadā syān na kadācid vā yady ahetuka eva saḥ // HSvs_[1.1]24 //
GR12hsasvrpu:99: tasmād avaśyam eṣṭavyaḥ kaścid hetus tayoḥ kṣayeṃ /
GR12hsasvrpu:100: sa eva dharmo vijñeyaḥ śuddho muktiphalapradaḥ // HSvs_[1.1]25 //
GR12hsasvrpu:102: heyaṃ dharmaṃ tadāśritya na tu saṃjñānayogakam // HSvs_[1.1]26 //
GR12hsasvrpu:103: atas tatraiva yuktāsthā yadi samyag nirūpyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:104: saṃsāre sarvam evānyat darśitaṃ duḥkhakāraṇam // HSvs_[1.1]27 //
GR12hsasvrpu:105: tasmāc ca jāyate muktir yathā mṛtyādivarjitā /
GR12hsasvrpu:112: acetanāni bhūtāni na taddharmo na tatphalam /
GR12hsasvrpu:113: cetanāsti ca yasyeyaṃ sa evātmeti cāpare // HSvs_[1.2]31 //
GR12hsasvrpu:114: yadīyaṃ bhūtadharmaḥ syāt pratyekaṃ teṣu sarvadā /
GR12hsasvrpu:117: na ca tenāpi rūpeṇa satyasaty eva cen na tat // HSvs_[1.2]33 //
GR12hsasvrpu:119: aikye sā cetaneveti nānātve 'nyasya sā yataḥ // HSvs_[1.2]34 //
GR12hsasvrpu:121: āvṛtir na yad anyena tattvasaṃkhyāvirodhataḥ // HSvs_[1.2]35 //
GR12hsasvrpu:122: na cāsau tatsvarūpeṇa teṣām anyatareṇa vā /
GR12hsasvrpu:126: na cāsau bhūtabhinno yat tato vyaktiḥ sadā bhavet /
GR12hsasvrpu:127: bhede tvadhikabhāvena tattvasaṃkhyā na yujyate // HSvs_[1.2]38 //
GR12hsasvrpu:128: svakāle 'bhinna ity evaṃ kālābhāve na saṅgatam /
GR12hsasvrpu:139: cetanā tu na tadrūpā sā kathaṃ tatphalaṃ bhavet ? // HSvs_[1.2]43 //
GR12hsasvrpu:140: pratyekam asatī teṣu na ca syād reṇutailavat /
GR12hsasvrpu:141: satī ced upalabhyeta bhinnarūpeṣu sarvadā // HSvs_[1.2]44 //
GR12hsasvrpu:142: asat sthūlatvam aṇvādau ghaṭādau dṛśyate yathā /
GR12hsasvrpu:143: tathāsatyeva bhūteṣu cetanāpīti cen matiḥ // HSvs_[1.2]45 //
GR12hsasvrpu:144: nāsat sthūlatvam aṇvādau tebhya eva tadudbhavāt /
GR12hsasvrpu:147: bhaved utpattir evaṃ ca tattvasaṃkhyā na yujyate // HSvs_[1.2]47 //
GR12hsasvrpu:148: na tajjananasvabhāvāś cet te 'tra mānaṃ na vidyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:149: sthūlatvotpāda iṣṭaś cet tatsadbhāve 'py asau samaḥ // HSvs_[1.2]48 //
GR12hsasvrpu:150: na ca mūrttāṇusaṅghāta-bhinnaṃ sthūlatvam ity adaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:151: teṣām eva tathābhāvo nyāyyaṃ mānāvirodhataḥ // HSvs_[1.2]49 //
GR12hsasvrpu:152: bhede tadadalaṃ yasmāt kathaṃ sadbhāvam aśnute /
GR12hsasvrpu:153: tadabhāve 'pi tadbhāve sadā sarvatra vā bhavet // HSvs_[1.2]50 //
GR12hsasvrpu:157: puruṣān na viśeṣaḥ syāt sa ca pratyakṣabādhitaḥ // HSvs_[1.2]52 //
GR12hsasvrpu:159: tatsaṃghāteṣu caitanyaṃ na sarveṣv etad apy asat // HSvs_[1.2]53 //
GR12hsasvrpu:160: svabhāvo bhūtamātratve sati nyāyān na bhidyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:161: viśeṣaṇaṃ vinā yasmān na tulyānāṃ viśiṣṭatā // HSvs_[1.2]54 //
GR12hsasvrpu:163: anyabhedakabhāve tu sa evātmā prasajyate // HSvs_[1.2]55 //
GR12hsasvrpu:165: yathā bhinnasvabhāvāni khādyakāni tatheti cet // HSvs_[1.2]56 //
GR12hsasvrpu:169: yatheyam asti bhūtānāṃ tathā sāpi kathaṃ na cet // HSvs_[1.2]58 //
GR12hsasvrpu:173: bhedakābhāvato bhedo yuktaḥ samyag vicintyatām // HSvs_[1.2]60 //
GR12hsasvrpu:175: yatas tad api no bhinnaṃ tatas tulyaṃ ca tat tayoḥ // HSvs_[1.2]61 //
GR12hsasvrpu:177: lokasiddheti siddhaiva na sā tanmātrajā nanu // HSvs_[1.2]62 //
GR12hsasvrpu:180: na ceha laukiko mārgaḥ sthito 'smābhir vicāryate /
GR12hsasvrpu:181: kiṃ tv ayaṃ yujyate kveti tvannītau coktavan na saḥ // HSvs_[1.2]64 //
GR12hsasvrpu:186: na cel lāvaṇyasadbhāvo na sa tanmātrahetukaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:187: ata evānyasadbhāvād asty ātmeti vyavasthitam // HSvs_[1.2]67 //
GR12hsasvrpu:188: na prāṇādir asau mānaṃ kiṃ tadbhāve 'pi tulyatā /
GR12hsasvrpu:189: tadabhāvād abhāvaś ced ātmābhāve na kā pramā // HSvs_[1.2]68 //
GR12hsasvrpu:191: saṃpādite 'py etat siddheḥ so 'nya eveti ced na tat // HSvs_[1.2]69 //
GR12hsasvrpu:193: atrāpi na pramāṇaṃ vaś caitanyotpattir eva cet // HSvs_[1.2]70 //
GR12hsasvrpu:194: na tasyām eva saṃdehāt tavāyaṃ kena neti cet /
GR12hsasvrpu:195: tattatsvarūpabhāvena tadabhāvaḥ kathaṃ nu cet // HSvs_[1.2]71 //
GR12hsasvrpu:197: sute tasmin na doṣaḥ syān na na bhāve 'sya mātari // HSvs_[1.2]72 //
GR12hsasvrpu:198: na ca saṃsvedajādyeṣu mātrabhāvena tad bhavet /
GR12hsasvrpu:199: pradīpajñātam apy atra nimittatvān na bādhakam // HSvs_[1.2]73 //
GR12hsasvrpu:200: itthaṃ na tadupādānaṃ yujyate tat kathaṃcana /
GR12hsasvrpu:201: anyopādānabhāve ca tad evātmā prasajyate // HSvs_[1.2]74 //
GR12hsasvrpu:203: kiñcin naśyati naikāntād yathāha vyāsamaharṣiḥ // HSvs_[1.2]75 //
GR12hsasvrpu:204: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:205: abhayor api dṛṣṭo 'ntas tv anayos tattvadarśibhiḥ // HSvs_[1.2]76 //
GR12hsasvrpu:207: bhāvo nābhāvam etīha dīpaś cen na sa sarvathā // HSvs_[1.2]77 //
GR12hsasvrpu:210: (3)maiṃ viṣayaka pratyakṣa anubhava se ātmā kī siddhi
GR12hsasvrpu:211: sato 'sya kiṃ ghaṭasyeva pratyakṣeṇa na darśanam /
GR12hsasvrpu:212: asty eva darśanaṃ spaṣṭam ahaṃpratyayavedanāt // HSvs_[1.3]79 //
GR12hsasvrpu:213: bhrānto 'haṃ gurur ity eṣaḥ satyam anyas tv asau mataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:216: pratyakṣābhāsam anyac ced vyabhicāri na sādhu tat // HSvs_[1.3]81 //
GR12hsasvrpu:218: atas tadvad asau mukhyaḥ samyak pratyakṣam iṣyatām // HSvs_[1.3]82 //
GR12hsasvrpu:219: gurvī me tanur ity ādau bhedapratyayadarśanāt /
GR12hsasvrpu:220: bhrāntatābhimatasyaiva sā yuktā netarasya tu // HSvs_[1.3]83 //
GR12hsasvrpu:222: tasyaiva tatsvabhāvatvāt na tu yuktyā na yujyate // HSvs_[1.3]84 //
GR12hsasvrpu:226: sadaivāgrahaṇaṃ hy evaṃ vijñeyaṃ karmadoṣataḥ // HSvs_[1.3]86 //
GR12hsasvrpu:228: svayaṃjyotiḥ sadaivātmā tathā vede 'pi paṭhyate // HSvs_[1.3]87 //
GR12hsasvrpu:229: (4) ātmā tathā karma ke sambandha meṃ matamatāntara
GR12hsasvrpu:231: kliṣṭaṃ mano 'sti yan nityaṃ tad yathoktātmalakṣaṇam // HSvs_[1.4]88 //
GR12hsasvrpu:233: athānityaṃ tataś cedaṃ na yathoktātmalakṣaṇam // HSvs_[1.4]89 //
GR12hsasvrpu:234: yaḥ kartā karmabhedānāṃ bhoktā karmaphalasya ca /
GR12hsasvrpu:235: saṃsarttā parinirvātā sa hy ātmā nānyalakṣaṇaḥ // HSvs_[1.4]90 //
GR12hsasvrpu:238: tathā tulye 'pi cārambhe sadupāye 'pi yo nṛṇām /
GR12hsasvrpu:239: phalabhedaḥ sa no yukto yuktyā hetvantaraṃ vinā // HSvs_[1.4]92 //
GR12hsasvrpu:242: bhūtānāṃ tatsvabhāvatvād ayam ity apy anuttaram /
GR12hsasvrpu:243: na bhūtātmaka evātmety etad atra nidarśitam // HSvs_[1.4]94 //
GR12hsasvrpu:244: karmaṇo bhautikatvena yad vaitad api sāmpratam /
GR12hsasvrpu:245: ātmano vyatiriktaṃ tat citrabhāvaṃ yato matam // HSvs_[1.4]95 //
GR12hsasvrpu:246: śaktirūpaṃ tad anye tu sūrayaḥ saṃpracakṣate /
GR12hsasvrpu:247: anye tu vāsanārūpaṃ vicitraphaladaṃ matam // HSvs_[1.4]96 //
GR12hsasvrpu:248: anye tv abhidadhaty atra svarūpaniyatasya vai /
GR12hsasvrpu:249: kartur vinānyasaṃbandhaṃ śaktir ākasmikī kutaḥ // HSvs_[1.4]97 //
GR12hsasvrpu:250: tatkriyāyogataḥ sā cet tadapuṣṭau na yujyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:251: tadanyayogābhāve ca puṣṭir asya kathaṃ bhavet // HSvs_[1.4]98 //
GR12hsasvrpu:252: asty eva sā sadā kantu kriyayā vyajyate param /
GR12hsasvrpu:253: ātmamātrasthitāyā na tasyā vyaktiḥ kadācana // HSvs_[1.4]99 //
GR12hsasvrpu:257: evam iṣṭakriyājanyaṃ puṇyaṃ kim iti nekṣyate // HSvs_[1.4]101 //
GR12hsasvrpu:261: mukhyaṃ tad eva vaḥ karma na yuktā vāsanānyathā // HSvs_[1.4]103 //
GR12hsasvrpu:263: tato 'muktiḥ sadaiva syād vaiśiṣṭyaṃ kevalasya na // HSvs_[1.4]104 //
GR12hsasvrpu:266: tasmāt tadātmano bhinnaṃ saccitraṃ cātmayogi ca /
GR12hsasvrpu:269: dharmādharmau tathā pāśaḥ paryāyās tasya kīrttitāḥ // HSvs_[1.4]107 //
GR12hsasvrpu:273: tad enam eva vidvāṃsas tattvavādaṃ pracakṣate // HSvs_[1.4]109 //
GR12hsasvrpu:276: itthaṃ tattvavilomaṃ yat tan na jñānavivardhanam // HSvs_[1.5]110 //
GR12hsasvrpu:278: ado 'pi yuktiśūnyaṃ yan nettham indraḥ pratāryate // HSvs_[1.5]111 //
GR12hsasvrpu:280: pāpaśrutaṃ sadā dhīrair varjyaṃ nāstikadarśanam // HSvs_[1.5]112 //
GR12hsasvrpu:282: (2)puṇya, pāpa tathā mokṣa se saṃbaṃdhita kuccha praśna
GR12hsasvrpu:284: jāyate niyamo mānāt kuto 'yam iti nāpare // HSvs_[2.1]113 //
GR12hsasvrpu:285: āgamākhyāt tadanye tu tac ca dṛṣṭādyabādhitam /
GR12hsasvrpu:288: tasyāpratyakṣe 'pi pāpādau na prāmāṇyaṃ na yujyate // HSvs_[2.1]115 //
GR12hsasvrpu:289: yadi nāma kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ saṃvādo 'nyatra vastuni /
GR12hsasvrpu:290: tadbhāvas tasya tattvaṃ vā kathaṃ samavasīyate ? // HSvs_[2.1]116 //
GR12hsasvrpu:302: badhyate puṇyapāpābhyāṃ mādhyasthyāt tu vimucyate // HSvs_[2.1]122 //
GR12hsasvrpu:304: kaḥ svabhāvāgamāvante śaraṇaṃ na prapadyate // HSvs_[2.1]123 //
GR12hsasvrpu:306: bādhitvāt kathaṃ hy etau śaraṇaṃ yuktivādinām // HSvs_[2.1]124 //
GR12hsasvrpu:307: pratītyā bādhyate yo yat svabhāvo na sa yujyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:309: vahneḥ śītatvam asty eva tatkāryaṃ kiṃ na dṛśyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:310: dṛśyate hi himāsanne katham itthaṃ svabhāvataḥ // HSvs_[2.1]126 //
GR12hsasvrpu:312: karoti dāham ity evaṃ vahnyādeḥ śītatā na kim // HSvs_[2.1]127 //
GR12hsasvrpu:313: vyavasthābhāvato hy evaṃ yā tvadbuddhir ihedṛśī /
GR12hsasvrpu:314: sā loṣṭād asya yat kāryaṃ tat tvattas tatsvabhāvataḥ // HSvs_[2.1]128 //
GR12hsasvrpu:316: astu cet ko vivādo no buddhiśūnyena sarvathā // HSvs_[2.1]129 //
GR12hsasvrpu:318: śubhāder eva saukhyādi kena mānena gamyate // HSvs_[2.1]130 //
GR12hsasvrpu:324: śubhāt saukhyaṃ tataḥ siddham ato 'nyac cāpy ato 'nyataḥ // HSvs_[2.1]133 //
GR12hsasvrpu:325: anye punar idaṃ śrāddhā bruvate āgamena vai /
GR12hsasvrpu:326: śubhāder eva saukhyādi gamyate nānyataḥ kvacit // HSvs_[2.1]134 //
GR12hsasvrpu:328: chadmasthasyāvisaṃvādi mānam atra na vidyate // HSvs_[2.1]135 //
GR12hsasvrpu:329: yac coktaṃ duḥkhabāhulya-darśanaṃ tan na sādhakam /
GR12hsasvrpu:331: sarvatra darśanaṃ yasya tadvākyāt kiṃ na sādhanam /
GR12hsasvrpu:332: sādhanaṃ tad bhavaty evam āgamāt tu na bhidyate // HSvs_[2.1]137 //
GR12hsasvrpu:333: aśubhād apy anuṣṭhānāt saukhyaprāptiś ca yā kvacit /
GR12hsasvrpu:336: na punas tata evaitad āgamād eva gamyate // HSvs_[2.1]139 //
GR12hsasvrpu:340: niyamād gamyate yasmāt tad asāv eva darśyate // HSvs_[2.1]141 //
GR12hsasvrpu:344: hetvabhāvena tadbhāvo nitya iṣṭena bādhyate // HSvs_[2.1]143 //
GR12hsasvrpu:346: sādhyate tat paraṃ yena tena doṣo na kaścana // HSvs_[2.1]144 //
GR12hsasvrpu:351: yāvad evaṃvidhaṃ naivaṃ pravṛttis tāvad eva yā /
GR12hsasvrpu:356: saṃbhāvyate paraṃ hy etad bhāvaśuddher mahātmanām // HSvs_[2.1]149 //
GR12hsasvrpu:358: muktiś cāsti tatas tasyāpy eṣa doṣo 'nivāritaḥ // HSvs_[2.1]150 //
GR12hsasvrpu:360: janmādirahitā yat tat sa evātra nirūpyate // HSvs_[2.1]151 //
GR12hsasvrpu:362: anyahetur ahetur vā sa vai karmakṣayo nanu // HSvs_[2.1]152 //
GR12hsasvrpu:364: karmakṣayāsthitau ca syān muktānāṃ muktatākṣitiḥ // HSvs_[2.1]153 //
GR12hsasvrpu:368: ahetutve sadā bhāvo 'bhāvo vā syāt sadaiva hi // HSvs_[2.1]155 //
GR12hsasvrpu:369: muktiḥ karmakṣayād iṣṭā jñānayogaphalaṃ ca saḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:370: ahiṃsādi ca taddhetur iti nyāyaḥ satāṃ mataḥ // HSvs_[2.1]156 //
GR12hsasvrpu:373: na hiṃsyād iha bhūtāni hiṃsanaṃ doṣakṛn matam /
GR12hsasvrpu:375: tato vyādhinivṛttyarthaṃ dāhaḥ kāryas tu codite /
GR12hsasvrpu:376: na tato 'pi na doṣaḥ syāt phaloddeśena codanāt // HSvs_[2.1]159 //
GR12hsasvrpu:378: dhruvam autsargiko doṣo jāyate phalacodanāt // HSvs_[2.1]160 //
GR12hsasvrpu:380: darśanīyā kuśāstrāṇāṃ tataś ca sthitamityadaḥ // HSvs_[2.1]161 //
GR12hsasvrpu:381: kliṣṭaṃ hiṃsādyanuṣṭhānaṃ na yat tasyānyato bhavet /
GR12hsasvrpu:382: tataḥ kartā sa eva syāt sarvasyaiva hi karmaṇaḥ // HSvs_[2.1]162 //
GR12hsasvrpu:390: kevalānāṃ tadanye tu mithaḥ sāmagryapekṣayā // HSvs_[2.2]164 //
GR12hsasvrpu:392: yat kiñcij jāyate loke tad asau kāraṇaṃ kila // HSvs_[2.2]165 //
GR12hsasvrpu:393: kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharati prajāḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:394: kālaḥ supteṣu jāgartti kālo hi duratikramaḥ // HSvs_[2.2]166 //
GR12hsasvrpu:396: sthālyādisaṃnidhāne 'pi tataḥ kālād asau matā // HSvs_[2.2]167 //
GR12hsasvrpu:397: kālābhāve ca garbhādi sarvaṃ syād avyavasthayā /
GR12hsasvrpu:400: yat kiñcij jāyate loke tad asau kāraṇaṃ kila // HSvs_[2.2]169 //
GR12hsasvrpu:406: tulye tatra mṛdaḥ kumbho na paṭādītyayuktimat // HSvs_[2.2]172 //
GR12hsasvrpu:407: niyatenaiva rūpeṇa sarve bhāvā bhavanti yat /
GR12hsasvrpu:408: tato niyatijā hy ete tatsvarūpānuvedhataḥ // HSvs_[2.2]173 //
GR12hsasvrpu:409: yad yadaiva yato yāvat tat tadaiva tatas tathā /
GR12hsasvrpu:410: niyataṃ jāyate nyāyāt ka etāṃ bādhituṃ kṣamaḥ // HSvs_[2.2]174 //
GR12hsasvrpu:411: na carte niyatiṃ loke mudgapaktir apīkṣyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:416: na cākṛtasya bhogaḥ syān muktānāṃ bhogabhāvataḥ // HSvs_[2.2]177 //
GR12hsasvrpu:417: bhogyaṃ ca viśvaṃ sattvānāṃ vidhinā tena tena yat /
GR12hsasvrpu:418: dṛśyate 'dhyakṣam evedaṃ tasmāt tat karmajaṃ hi tat // HSvs_[2.2]178 //
GR12hsasvrpu:419: na ca tat karmavaidhurye mudgapaktir apīkṣyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:422: tasya yasmād vicitratvaṃ niyatyāder na yujyate // HSvs_[2.2]180 //
GR12hsasvrpu:424: tathāniyatabhāve ca balāt syāt tadvicitratā // HSvs_[2.2]181 //
GR12hsasvrpu:429: tadbhinnabhedakatve ca tatra tasyā na kartṛtā /
GR12hsasvrpu:430: tatkartṛtve ca citratvaṃ tadvat tasyāpyasaṃgatam // HSvs_[2.2]184 //
GR12hsasvrpu:431: tasyā eva tathābhūtaḥ svabhāvo yadi ceṣyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:432: tyaktaḥ niyativādaḥ syāt svabhāvāśrayaṇān nanu // HSvs_[2.2]185 //
GR12hsasvrpu:433: svo bhāvaś ca svabhāvo 'pi svasattaiva hi bhāvataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:436: na cāsāv iti sadyuktyā tadvādo 'ip na saṃgataḥ // HSvs_[2.2]187 //
GR12hsasvrpu:439: kālo 'pi samayādir yat kevalaṃ so 'pi kāraṇam /
GR12hsasvrpu:440: tata eva hy asaṃbhūteḥ kasyacin nopapadyate // HSvs_[2.2]189 //
GR12hsasvrpu:441: ataś ca kāle tulye 'pi sarvatraiva na tatphalam /
GR12hsasvrpu:442: ato hetvantarāpekṣaṃ vijñeyaṃ tad vicakṣaṇaiḥ // HSvs_[2.2]190 //
GR12hsasvrpu:445: na caikaikata eveha kvacit kiñcid apīkṣyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:446: tasmāt sarvasya kāryasya sāmagrī janikā matā // HSvs_[2.2]192 //
GR12hsasvrpu:448: dharmāvanye tu sarvasya sāmānyenaiva vastunaḥ // HSvs_[2.2]193 //
GR12hsasvrpu:453: jñānam apratighaṃ yasya vairāgyaṃ ca jagatpateḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:454: aiśvaryaṃ caiva dharmaś ca sahasiddhaṃ catuṣṭayam // HSvs_[3.1]195 //
GR12hsasvrpu:456: īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ vā śvabhram eva vā // HSvs_[3.1]196 //
GR12hsasvrpu:457: anye tv abhidadhaty atra vītarāgasya bhāvataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:458: itthaṃ prayojanābhāvāt kartṛtvaṃ yujyate katham ? // HSvs_[3.1]197 //
GR12hsasvrpu:460: karmaṇi prerayaty āśu sa jantūn kena hetunā ? // HSvs_[3.1]198 //
GR12hsasvrpu:461: svayam eva pravartante sattvāś cet citrakarmaṇi /
GR12hsasvrpu:462: nirarthakam iheśasya kartṛtvaṃ gīyate katham ? // HSvs_[3.1]199 //
GR12hsasvrpu:463: phalaṃ dadāti cet sarvaṃ tat teneha pracoditam /
GR12hsasvrpu:464: aphale pūrvadoṣaḥ syāt saphale bhaktimātratā // HSvs_[3.1]200 //
GR12hsasvrpu:467: karmādes tatsvabhāvatve na kiñcid bādhyate vibhoḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:472: yato muktis tatas tasyāḥ kartā syād guṇabhāvataḥ // HSvs_[3.1]204 //
GR12hsasvrpu:474: tena tasyāpi kartṛtvaṃ kalpyamānaṃ na duṣyati // HSvs_[3.1]205 //
GR12hsasvrpu:475: kartāyam iti tadvākye yataḥ keṣāṃcid ādaraḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:478: sa ca karteti nirdoṣaḥ kartṛvādo vyavasthitaḥ // HSvs_[3.1]207 //
GR12hsasvrpu:481: abhiprāyas tatas teṣāṃ samyag mṛgyo hitaiṣiṇā /
GR12hsasvrpu:484: yas tarkeṇānusaṃdhatte sa dharmaṃ veda netaraḥ // HSvs_[3.1]210 //
GR12hsasvrpu:486: pradhānodbhavam anye tu manyante sarvam eva hi /
GR12hsasvrpu:491: nātmavyāpārajaṃ kiñcit teṣāṃ loke 'pi vidyate // HSvs_[3.2]213 //
GR12hsasvrpu:492: anye tu bruvate hy etat prakriyāmātravarṇanam /
GR12hsasvrpu:493: avicāryaiva tad yuktyā śraddhayā gamyate param // HSvs_[3.2]214 //
GR12hsasvrpu:494: yuktyā tu bādhyate yasmāt pradhānaṃ nityam iṣyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:495: tathātvāpracyutau cāsya mahadādi kathaṃ bhavet ? // HSvs_[3.2]215 //
GR12hsasvrpu:496: tasyaiva tatsvabhāvatvād iti cet kiṃ na sarvadā /
GR12hsasvrpu:497: ata eveti cet tasya tathātve nanu tat kutaḥ ? // HSvs_[3.2]216 //
GR12hsasvrpu:502: tatrāpi dehaḥ kartā cen naivāsāv ātmanaḥ pṛthak /
GR12hsasvrpu:503: pṛthag eveti ced bhoga ātmano yujyate katham ? // HSvs_[3.2]219 //
GR12hsasvrpu:507: manaḥ karoti sānnidhyād upādhiḥ sphaṭikaṃ yathā // HSvs_[3.2]221 //
GR12hsasvrpu:511: muktair atiprasaṃgāc ca na vai bhogaḥ kadācana // HSvs_[3.2]223 //
GR12hsasvrpu:512: na ca pūrvasvabhāvatvāt sa muktānām asaṃgataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:514: dehāt pṛthaktva evāsya na ca hiṃsādayaḥ kvacit /
GR12hsasvrpu:517: yamādi tadabhāve ca sarvam eva hy apārthakam // HSvs_[3.2]226 //
GR12hsasvrpu:518: ātmā na badhyate nāpi mucyate 'sau kadācana /
GR12hsasvrpu:519: badhyate mucyate cāpi prakṛtiḥ svātmaneti cet // HSvs_[3.2]227 //
GR12hsasvrpu:521: tasyāḥ kriyāntarābhāvād bandhamokṣau tu yujtitaḥ // HSvs_[3.2]228 //
GR12hsasvrpu:522: mokṣaḥ prakṛtyayogo yad ato 'syaḥ sa kathaṃ bhavet /
GR12hsasvrpu:525: jaṭī muṇḍī śikhī vāpi mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // HSvs_[3.2]230 //
GR12hsasvrpu:527: itthaṃ na ghaṭate ceyam iti sarvamayuktimat // HSvs_[3.2]231 //
GR12hsasvrpu:529: prakṛtiṃ cāpi sannyāyāt karmaprakṛtim eva ca // HSvs_[3.2]232 //
GR12hsasvrpu:532: nāmūrtaṃ mūrtatāṃ yāti mūrtaṃ na yāty amūrtatām /
GR12hsasvrpu:533: yato bandhād yato nyāyād ātmano 'saṃgataṃ tayā // HSvs_[3.2]234 //
GR12hsasvrpu:535: anyonyavyāptijā ceyam iti bandhādi saṃgatam // HSvs_[3.2]235 //
GR12hsasvrpu:538: evaṃ prakṛtivādo 'pi vijñeyaḥ satya eva hi /
GR12hsasvrpu:539: kapiloktatvataś caiva divyo hi sa mahāmuniḥ // HSvs_[3.2]237 //
GR12hsasvrpu:544: ta āhuḥ kṣaṇikaṃ sarvaṃ nāśahetor ayogataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:546: jñānamātraṃ ca yal loke jñānam evānubhūyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:547: nārthas tadvyatirekeṇa tato 'sau naiva vidyate // HSvs_[4.1]240 //
GR12hsasvrpu:549: bāhyārthavedanāc caiva sarvam etad apārthakam // HSvs_[4.1]241 //
GR12hsasvrpu:551: kālāntare tathānitye mukhyam etan na yujyate // HSvs_[4.1]242 //
GR12hsasvrpu:553: dṛṣṭakautukam udvegaḥ pravṛttiḥ prāptir eva ca // HSvs_[4.1]243 //
GR12hsasvrpu:555: śīlānuṣṭhānahetur yaḥ sa naśyati tadaiva yat // HSvs_[4.1]244 //
GR12hsasvrpu:557: sa caika eva tasmiṃś ca sati kasmān na yujyate // HSvs_[4.1]245 //
GR12hsasvrpu:558: yasminn eva tu saṃtāne āhitā karmavāsanā /
GR12hsasvrpu:559: phalaṃ tatraiva saṃdhatte karpāse raktatā yathā // HSvs_[4.1]246 //
GR12hsasvrpu:560: etad apy uktimātraṃ yan na hetuphalabhāvataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:562: (2) bhāva abhāva bana jātā hai isa mata kā khaṃḍana
GR12hsasvrpu:565: sato 'sattve tadutpādas tato nāśo 'pi tasya yat /
GR12hsasvrpu:566: tannaṣṭasya punarbhāvaḥ sadā nāśo na tatsthitiḥ // HSvs_[4.2]249 //
GR12hsasvrpu:568: yujyate hy etad apy asya tathā coktānatikramaḥ // HSvs_[4.2]250 //
GR12hsasvrpu:570: na paścād api sā neti sato 'sattvaṃ vyavasthitam // HSvs_[4.2]251 //
GR12hsasvrpu:571: na tad bhavati cet kiṃ na sadā sattva tad eva yat /
GR12hsasvrpu:572: na bhavaty etad evāsya bhavanaṃ sūrayo viduḥ // HSvs_[4.2]252 //
GR12hsasvrpu:574: tucchatvān nety atucchasyāpy atucchatvāt kathaṃ nanu ? // HSvs_[4.2]253 //
GR12hsasvrpu:575: tadā bhūter iyaṃ tulyā tannivṛtter na tasya kim /
GR12hsasvrpu:576: tucchatāpterna bhāvo 'stu nāsat sat sadasat katham ? // HSvs_[4.2]254 //
GR12hsasvrpu:577: svahetor eva tajjātaṃ tatsvabhāvaṃ yato nanu /
GR12hsasvrpu:580: tataḥ kathaṃ nu tadbhāva iti yuktyā kathaṃ samam ? // HSvs_[4.2]256 //
GR12hsasvrpu:581: sa eva bhāvas taddhetus tasyaiva tathāsthiteḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:582: svanivṛttiḥ svabhāvo 'sya bhāvasyeva tato na kim ? // HSvs_[4.2]257 //
GR12hsasvrpu:584: tadabhāve na tajjñānaṃ tannivṛtter gatiḥ katham ? // HSvs_[4.2]258 //
GR12hsasvrpu:585: tat tadvidhasvabhāvaṃ yat pratyakṣeṇa tathaiva hi /
GR12hsasvrpu:586: gṛhyate tadgatis tena naitat kvacid aniścayāt // HSvs_[4.2]259 //
GR12hsasvrpu:587: samāropādasau neti gṛhītaṃ tattvatas tu tat /
GR12hsasvrpu:589: gṛhītaṃ sarvam etena tattvato niścayaḥ punaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:592: na tathā pāṭavābhāvād ity apūrvam idaṃ tamaḥ // HSvs_[4.2]262 //
GR12hsasvrpu:595: tasyāṃ ca nāgṛhītāyāṃ tat tatheti viniścayaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:596: na hīndriyam atītādi-grāhakaṃ sadbhir iṣyate // HSvs_[4.2]264 //
GR12hsasvrpu:598: na tad eva ghaṭābhāvo bhāvatvena pratītitaḥ // HSvs_[4.2]265 //
GR12hsasvrpu:601: tasmād avaśyam eṣṭavyaṃ tad ūrdhvaṃ tuccham eva tat /
GR12hsasvrpu:602: jñeyaṃ sad jñāyate hy etad apareṇāpi yuktimat // HSvs_[4.2]267 //
GR12hsasvrpu:604: nivṛttibhedataś caiva buddhibhedāc ca bhāvyatām // HSvs_[4.2]268 //
GR12hsasvrpu:606: na tatra kiñcid bhavati na bhavaty eva kevalam // HSvs_[4.2]269 //
GR12hsasvrpu:607: bhāve hy eṣa vikalpaḥ syād vidher vastvanurodhataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:608: na bhāvo bhavatīty uktam abhāvo bhavatīty api // HSvs_[4.2]270 //
GR12hsasvrpu:613: bhāvasyābhavanaṃ yat tad abhāvabhavanaṃ tu yat /
GR12hsasvrpu:614: tattathādharmake hy ukta-vikalpo na virudhyate // HSvs_[4.2]273 //
GR12hsasvrpu:615: tad eva na bhavatyetad viruddhamiva lakṣyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:618: bhāvo nābhāvametīha tataś caitad vyavasthitam // HSvs_[4.2]275 //
GR12hsasvrpu:622: nāsattvaṃ tadabhāve tu na tatsattvaṃ tadanyavat // HSvs_[4.3]276 //
GR12hsasvrpu:627: tatsattvasādhakaṃ tan na tad eva hi tadā na yat /
GR12hsasvrpu:628: ata evedamicchantu na vai tasyetyayogataḥ // HSvs_[4.3]279 //
GR12hsasvrpu:630: nānyat tataś ca nāmneha na tathāsti prayojanam // HSvs_[4.3]280 //
GR12hsasvrpu:632: cintyatāṃ yadi sannyāyād vastusthityāpi tattathā // HSvs_[4.3]281 //
GR12hsasvrpu:633: sādhakatve tu sarvasya tato bhāvaḥ prasajyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:634: kāraṇāśrayaṇo 'py evaṃ na tatsattvaṃ tadanyavat // HSvs_[4.3]282 //
GR12hsasvrpu:635: kiñca tat kāraṇaṃ kārya-bhūtikāle na vidyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:636: tato na janakaṃ tasya tadāsattvāt paraṃ yathā // HSvs_[4.3]283 //
GR12hsasvrpu:637: anantaraṃ ca tadbhāvas tattvād eva nirarthakaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:639: stastau bhinnāvabhinnau vā tābhyāṃ bede tayoḥ kutaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:641: na hetuphalabhāvaś ca tasyāṃ satyāṃ hi yujyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:643: kalpitaś ced ayaṃ dharma-dharmibhāvo hi bhāvataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:644: na hetuphalabhāvaḥ syāt sarvathā tadabhāvataḥ // HSvs_[4.3]287 //
GR12hsasvrpu:645: na dharmī kalpito dharma-dharmibhāvas tu kalpitaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:646: pūrvo hetur niraṃśaḥ sa uttaraḥ phalam ucyate // HSvs_[4.3]288 //
GR12hsasvrpu:648: tasyaiva tu tathābhāve 'sataḥ sattvamado na sat // HSvs_[4.3]289 //
GR12hsasvrpu:649: taṃ pratītya tadutpāda iti tuccham idaṃ vacaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:650: atiprasaṃgataś caiva tathā cāha mahāmatiḥ // HSvs_[4.3]290 //
GR12hsasvrpu:652: kāraṇānantaraṃ kāryaṃ drāg nabhastas tato na tat // HSvs_[4.3]291 //
GR12hsasvrpu:660: tata eva videśasthāt so 'pi yat tan na bādhakam // HSvs_[4.3]295 //
GR12hsasvrpu:662: nāsato bhāvakartṛtvaṃ tadavasthāntaraṃ na saḥ // HSvs_[4.3]296 //
GR12hsasvrpu:664: sā tatphalaṃ matā saiva bhāvotpattis tadātmikā // HSvs_[4.3]297 //
GR12hsasvrpu:667: pratikṣiptaṃ ca tad hetoḥ prāpnoti phalatāṃ vinā /
GR12hsasvrpu:668: asato bhāvakartṛtvaṃ tadavasthāntaraṃ ca saḥ // HSvs_[4.3]299 //
GR12hsasvrpu:670: nabhaḥpātād asatsattva-yogād veti na tatphalam // HSvs_[4.3]300 //
GR12hsasvrpu:671: asadutpattir apy eva nāsyaiva prāg asattvataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:672: kiṃ tv asat sad bhavaty evam iti samyag vicāryatām // HSvs_[4.3]301 //
GR12hsasvrpu:673: etac ca noktavad yuktyā sarvathā yujyate yataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:674: nābhāvo bhāvatāṃ yāti vyavasthitam idaṃ tataḥ // HSvs_[4.3]302 //
GR12hsasvrpu:677: janakatvena buddhyādeḥ kalpyate sāpy anarthikā // HSvs_[4.4]303 //
GR12hsasvrpu:679: rūpādīnāṃ tataḥ kārya-bhedas tebhyo na yujyate // HSvs_[4.4]304 //
GR12hsasvrpu:681: tebhyas tāvadbhya eveti tad etac cintyatāṃ katham // HSvs_[4.4]305 //
GR12hsasvrpu:684: tān aśeṣān pratītyeha bhavad ekaṃ kathaṃ bhavet /
GR12hsasvrpu:685: ekasvabhāvam ekaṃ yat tat tu nānekabhāvataḥ // HSvs_[4.4]307 //
GR12hsasvrpu:687: tāvat sāmarthyajatve ca kutas tasyaikarūpatā // HSvs_[4.4]308 //
GR12hsasvrpu:688: yaj jāyate pratītyaika-sāmarthyaṃ nānyato hi tat /
GR12hsasvrpu:689: tayor abhinnatāpatter bhede bhedas tayor api // HSvs_[4.4]309 //
GR12hsasvrpu:691: sarvasāmarthyabhūtisva-bhāvatvāt tasya cen na tat // HSvs_[4.4]310 //
GR12hsasvrpu:692: pratyekaṃ tasya tadbhāve yuktā hy uktasvabhāvatā /
GR12hsasvrpu:694: atra coktaṃ na cāpy eṣāṃ tatsvabhāvatvakalpanā /
GR12hsasvrpu:697: na tad eva tad ity evaṃ nānā caikatra tat kutaḥ // HSvs_[4.4]313 //
GR12hsasvrpu:703: nimittakāraṇaṃ jñāne tat tenānyena vā bhavet // HSvs_[4.4]316 //
GR12hsasvrpu:704: yadi tenaiva vijñānaṃ bodharūpaṃ na yujyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:705: athānyena balād rūpaṃ dvisvabhāvaṃ prasajyate // HSvs_[4.4]317 //
GR12hsasvrpu:707: rūpakṣaṇo hy abuddhitvāt kathaṃ rūpasya sādhakaḥ // HSvs_[4.4]318 //
GR12hsasvrpu:711: ucyate tadabhāvāc ced bhāvo 'nyasyāḥ prasajyate // HSvs_[4.4]320 //
GR12hsasvrpu:715: yadi jñāne 'pi bhedaḥ syāt na ced bhedo na yujyate // HSvs_[4.4]322 //
GR12hsasvrpu:717: yad hetuhetumadbhāvas tad eṣāpy uktimātrakam // HSvs_[4.4]323 //
GR12hsasvrpu:720: saty apy asmin mitho 'tyantaṃ tadbhedād iti cintyatām // HSvs_[4.5]324 //
GR12hsasvrpu:722: asaṃbhavaḥ kathaṃ nv asya vikalpānupapattitaḥ // HSvs_[4.5]325 //
GR12hsasvrpu:723: vāsakād vāsanā bhinnā abhinnā vā bhaved yadi /
GR12hsasvrpu:724: bhinnā svayaṃ tayā śūnyo naivānyaṃ vāsayaty asau // HSvs_[4.5]326 //
GR12hsasvrpu:726: vāsye satyāṃ ca saṃsiddhir dravyāṃśasya prajāyate // HSvs_[4.5]327 //
GR12hsasvrpu:727: asatyām api saṃkrāntau vāsayaty eva ced asau /
GR12hsasvrpu:728: atiprasaṃgaḥ syād evaṃ sa ca nyāyabahiṣkṛtaḥ // HSvs_[4.5]328 //
GR12hsasvrpu:730: tattvato 'nya iti nyāyāt sa cāyukto nidarśitaḥ // HSvs_[4.5]329 //
GR12hsasvrpu:731: (6) kṣaṇikavāda meṃ kāryakāraṇa jñāna kī anupapatti
GR12hsasvrpu:733: ataḥ svabhāvaniyamān nāyuktaḥ sa kadācana // HSvs_[4.6]330 //
GR12hsasvrpu:735: tayor nyāyyaṃ na caikena dvayor gahaṇam asti vaḥ // HSvs_[4.6]331 //
GR12hsasvrpu:736: ekam arthaṃ vijānāti na vijñānadvayaṃ yathā /
GR12hsasvrpu:737: vijānāti na vijñānam ekam arthadvayaṃ tathā // HSvs_[4.6]332 //
GR12hsasvrpu:739: no bādhakaṃ na caikena dvayor gahaṇam asty adaḥ // HSvs_[4.6]333 //
GR12hsasvrpu:741: kadācid api yukto yad ataḥ katham abādhakam // HSvs_[4.6]334 //
GR12hsasvrpu:743: na dhūmādigrahād eva hy analādigatiḥ katham // HSvs_[4.6]335 //
GR12hsasvrpu:745: tulyayor api tadbhāve hanta kvacid adarśanāt // HSvs_[4.6]336 //
GR12hsasvrpu:747: aughāt taddhetuviṣayaṃ na tv evam itarasya ca // HSvs_[4.6]337 //
GR12hsasvrpu:749: so 'py evaṃ na ca taddhetos tajjñānād api tadgatiḥ // HSvs_[4.6]338 //
GR12hsasvrpu:750: tajjñānaṃ yan na vai dhūma-jñānasya samanantaraḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:751: tathābhūd ity ato neha tajjñānād api tadgatiḥ // HSvs_[4.6]339 //
GR12hsasvrpu:752: tatheti hanta ko nv arthaḥ tattathābhāvato yadi /
GR12hsasvrpu:753: itaratraikam evetthaṃ jñānaṃ tadgrāhi bhāvyatām // HSvs_[4.6]340 //
GR12hsasvrpu:757: tathā vikalpakṛn nānyad iti pratyuktam iṣyatām // HSvs_[4.6]342 //
GR12hsasvrpu:758: ataḥ kathaṃcid ekena tayor agrahaṇe sati /
GR12hsasvrpu:762: na pūrvam uttaraṃ ceha tadanyāgrahaṇād dhruvam /
GR12hsasvrpu:763: gṛhyate 'ta idaṃ nāto na tv atīndriyadarśanam // HSvs_[4.6]345 //
GR12hsasvrpu:764: vikalpo 'pi tathā nyāyād yujyate na hy anīdṛśaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:767: mādhyasthyam avalambyaitat cintyatāṃ svayam eva tu // HSvs_[4.6]347 //
GR12hsasvrpu:769: vrajaty ākārabhedena kuto bodhānvayas tataḥ // HSvs_[4.6]348 //
GR12hsasvrpu:772: svasaṃvedanasiddhatvāt na ca bhrānto 'yam ity api /
GR12hsasvrpu:775: asya ca bhrāntatāyāṃ yat tat tatheti na yuktimat // HSvs_[4.6]351 //
GR12hsasvrpu:781: yataś ceṣṭas tato nāsmāt tatrāsaṃdigdhaniścayaḥ // HSvs_[4.6]354 //
GR12hsasvrpu:783: tasyaiva bhāvo nānyo yaj janyāc ca jananaṃ tathā // HSvs_[4.6]355 //
GR12hsasvrpu:785: tad eva hi yato bhāvaḥ sa cetarasamāśrayaḥ // HSvs_[4.6]356 //
GR12hsasvrpu:786: ity evam anvayāpattiḥ śabdārthād eva jāyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:787: anyathā kalpanaṃ cāsya sarvathā nyāyabādhitam // HSvs_[4.6]357 //
GR12hsasvrpu:789: vyāpāro 'pi na tasyāpi nāpekṣāsattvataḥ kvacit // HSvs_[4.6]358 //
GR12hsasvrpu:792: (7) buddhavacanoṃ kī sahāyatā se kṣaṇikavāda kā khaṃḍana
GR12hsasvrpu:794: virodhāpādanaṃ cāsya nālpasya tamasaḥ phalam // HSvs_[4.7]360 //
GR12hsasvrpu:795: ita ekanavate kalpe śaktyā me puruṣo hataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:796: tena karmavipākena pāde viddho 'smi bhikṣavaḥ // HSvs_[4.7]361 //
GR12hsasvrpu:798: svayam āptena yat tad vaḥ ko 'yaṃ kṣaṇikatāgrahaḥ // HSvs_[4.7]362 //
GR12hsasvrpu:800: sa hetuphalabhāvo yat tan me iti na saṃgatam // HSvs_[4.7]363 //
GR12hsasvrpu:802: nātra pramāṇam atyakṣā tadvivakṣā yato matā // HSvs_[4.7]364 //
GR12hsasvrpu:803: taddeśanā pramāṇaṃ cet na sānyārthā bhaviṣyati /
GR12hsasvrpu:804: tatrāpi kiṃ pramāṇaṃ ced idaṃ pūrvoktam ārṣakam // HSvs_[4.7]365 //
GR12hsasvrpu:805: tathānyad api yat kalpa-sthāyinī pṛthivī kvacit /
GR12hsasvrpu:806: uktā bhagavatā bhikṣūn āmantrya svayam eva tu // HSvs_[4.7]366 //
GR12hsasvrpu:807: pañca bāhyā dvivijñeyā ity anyad api cārṣakam /
GR12hsasvrpu:812: gṛhītagrahaṇād evaṃ mithyā tathāgataṃ vacaḥ // HSvs_[4.7]369 //
GR12hsasvrpu:814: yadrūpādi tatas tatra manojñānaṃ pravartate // HSvs_[4.7]370 //
GR12hsasvrpu:816: pañcānām api cen nyāyād etad apy asamañjasam // HSvs_[4.7]371 //
GR12hsasvrpu:819: sattve 'pi nendriyajñānaṃ hanta tad gocaraṃ matam /
GR12hsasvrpu:820: dvivijñeyatvam ity evaṃ kṣaṇabhede na tattvataḥ // HSvs_[4.7]373 //
GR12hsasvrpu:822: tathāpy ūrdhvaṃ viśeṣeṇa kiñcit tatrāpi vakṣyate // HSvs_[4.7]374 //
GR12hsasvrpu:826: mānaṃ yat tattvataḥ kiñcid arthābhāve na vidyate // HSvs_[5.1]375 //
GR12hsasvrpu:827: na pratyakṣaṃ yato 'bhāvā-lambanaṃ na tad iṣyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:832: eṣāṃ ca tatsvabhāvatve tasyāsiddhiḥ kathaṃ bhavet // HSvs_[5.1]378 //
GR12hsasvrpu:834: janayaty eva saty evam anyathātatsvabhāvatā // HSvs_[5.1]379 //
GR12hsasvrpu:836: hantaivam api siddho vaḥ kadācid upalabdhitaḥ // HSvs_[5.1]380 //
GR12hsasvrpu:838: na hi loke 'śvam āṣādeḥ siddhā paktyādiyogyatā // HSvs_[5.1]381 //
GR12hsasvrpu:839: parābhiprāyato hy etad evaṃ ced ucyate na yat /
GR12hsasvrpu:841: atadgrahaṇabhāvaiś ca yadi nāma na gṛhyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:843: vijñānaṃ yat svasaṃvedyaṃ na tvartho yuktyayogataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:844: atas tadvedane tasya grahaṇaṃ nopapadyate // HSvs_[5.1]384 //
GR12hsasvrpu:846: ataḥ kimucyate mānam arthābhāve na vidyate // HSvs_[5.1]385 //
GR12hsasvrpu:848: tadvedane grahas tasya tataḥ kiṃ nopapadyate // HSvs_[5.1]386 //
GR12hsasvrpu:851: jñānamātre tu vijñānaṃ jñānam evety ado bhavet /
GR12hsasvrpu:852: pravṛttyādi tato na syāt prasiddhaṃ lokaśāstrayoḥ // HSvs_[5.1]388 //
GR12hsasvrpu:859: virodhān nobhayākāram anyathā tad asad bhavet /
GR12hsasvrpu:860: niḥsvabhāvatvatas tasya sattaivaṃ yujyate katham // HSvs_[5.1]392 //
GR12hsasvrpu:862: akarmakaṃ tathā caitat svayam eva prakāśate // HSvs_[5.1]393 //
GR12hsasvrpu:863: yathāste śeta ity ādau vinā karma sa eva hi /
GR12hsasvrpu:864: tathocyate jagaty asmiṃs tathā jñānam apīṣyatām // HSvs_[5.1]394 //
GR12hsasvrpu:865: ucyate sāṃpratam adaḥ svayam eva vicintyatām /
GR12hsasvrpu:866: pramāṇābhāvatas tatra yady etad upapadyate // HSvs_[5.1]395 //
GR12hsasvrpu:867: evaṃ na yat tadātmānam api hanta prakāśayet /
GR12hsasvrpu:868: atas tad itthaṃ no yuktam anyathā na vyavasthitiḥ // HSvs_[5.1]396 //
GR12hsasvrpu:870: dhruvaṃ yatas tato 'karmakatvam asya kathaṃ bhavet // HSvs_[5.1]397 //
GR12hsasvrpu:871: vyavasthāpakam asyaivaṃ bhrāntaṃ caitat tu bhāvataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:872: tathety abhrāntam atrāpi nanu mānaṃ na vidyate // HSvs_[5.1]398 //
GR12hsasvrpu:874: dṛṣṭā taimirikādīnām akṣādāv iti cen na tat // HSvs_[5.1]399 //
GR12hsasvrpu:876: bhrāntaṃ tasya tathābhāve bhrāntasyābhrāntatā bhavet // HSvs_[5.1]400 //
GR12hsasvrpu:877: na ca prakāśamātraṃ tu loke kvacid akarmakam /
GR12hsasvrpu:878: dīpādau yujyate nyāyād ataś caitad apārthakam // HSvs_[5.1]401 //
GR12hsasvrpu:880: na ca sādhyasya yat tena śabdamātram asāv api // HSvs_[5.1]402 //
GR12hsasvrpu:883: viśeṣo vidyate kaścit tathā caitad vṛthoditam // HSvs_[5.2]403 //
GR12hsasvrpu:885: tad eva tair vinirmuktaṃ bhavānta iti kathyate // HSvs_[5.2]404 //
GR12hsasvrpu:886: rāgādikleśavargo yan na vijñānāt pṛthag mataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:887: ekāntaikasvabhāve ca tasmin kiṃ kena vāsitam // HSvs_[5.2]405 //
GR12hsasvrpu:888: kliṣṭaṃ vijñānam evāsau kliṣṭatā tasya yadvaśāt /
GR12hsasvrpu:889: nīlyādivad asau vastu tadvad eva prasajyate // HSvs_[5.2]406 //
GR12hsasvrpu:890: muktau ca tasya bhedena bhāvaḥ syāt paṭaśuddhivat /
GR12hsasvrpu:892: prakṛtyaiva tathābhūtaṃ tad eva kliṣṭateti cet /
GR12hsasvrpu:894: asaty api ca yā bāhye grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇā /
GR12hsasvrpu:895: dvicandrabhrāntivad bhrāntir iyaṃ naḥ kliṣṭateti cet // HSvs_[5.2]409 //
GR12hsasvrpu:897: iyaṃ syāt timirābhāve na hīndudvayadarśanam // HSvs_[5.2]410 //
GR12hsasvrpu:898: na cāsad eva taddhetur bodhamātraṃ na cāpi tat /
GR12hsasvrpu:899: sadaiva kliṣṭatāpatter iti muktir na yujyate // HSvs_[5.2]411 //
GR12hsasvrpu:900: muktyabhāve ca sarvaiva nanu cintā nirarthikā /
GR12hsasvrpu:901: bhāve 'pi sarvadā tasyāḥ samyag etat vicintyatām // HSvs_[5.2]412 //
GR12hsasvrpu:903: prājñasyābhineveśo na tasmād atrāpi yujyate // HSvs_[5.2]413 //
GR12hsasvrpu:905: (1) nirhetuka vināśa se kṣaṇikavāda kī siddhi nahīṃ
GR12hsasvrpu:907: nāśahetor ayogādi tad idānīṃ parīkṣyate // HSvs_[6.1]414 //
GR12hsasvrpu:908: hetoḥ syān naśvaro bhāvo 'naśvaro vā vikalpya yat /
GR12hsasvrpu:909: nāśahetor ayogitvam ucyate tan na yuktimat // HSvs_[6.1]415 //
GR12hsasvrpu:910: hetuṃ pratītya yad asau tathā naśvara iṣyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:914: na punaḥ kriyate kiñcit tenāsya sahakāriṇā /
GR12hsasvrpu:915: samānakālabhāvitvāt tathā coktam idaṃ tava // HSvs_[6.1]418 //
GR12hsasvrpu:916: upakārī virodhī ca sahakārī ca yo mataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:918: sahakārikṛto hetor viśeṣo nāsti yady api /
GR12hsasvrpu:923: apekṣāyāṃ niyuṅkte yat kāryametad vṛthoditam // HSvs_[6.1]422 //
GR12hsasvrpu:925: bhāvahetuṃ samāśritya nanu nyāyān nidarśitam // HSvs_[6.1]423 //
GR12hsasvrpu:927: nāśyamāśritya nāśasya kriyate yad vicakṣaṇaiḥ // HSvs_[6.1]424 //
GR12hsasvrpu:928: kiñca nirhetuke nāśe hiṃsakatvaṃ na yujyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:929: vyāpādyate sadā yasmān na kaścit kenacit kvacit // HSvs_[6.1]425 //
GR12hsasvrpu:931: hiṃsakas tan na santāna-samutpatter asaṃbhavāt // HSvs_[6.1]426 //
GR12hsasvrpu:933: na stastadadharmatvāc ca hetus tatprabhave kutaḥ // HSvs_[6.1]427 //
GR12hsasvrpu:936: hanmyenam iti saṃkleśād hiṃsakaś cet prakalpyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:937: naivaṃ tvannītito yasmād ayam eva na yujyate // HSvs_[6.1]429 //
GR12hsasvrpu:938: saṃkleśo yad guṇotpādaḥ sa cākliṣṭān na kevalāt /
GR12hsasvrpu:940: taṃ prāpya tatsvabhāvatvāt tataḥ sa iti cen nanu /
GR12hsasvrpu:941: nāśahetum avāpyaivaṃ nāśapakṣe 'pi na kṣatiḥ // HSvs_[6.1]431 //
GR12hsasvrpu:943: evam āhur ahetutvaṃ janakasyāpi sarvathā // HSvs_[6.1]432 //
GR12hsasvrpu:949: asiddhes tatra nītyā tad vyavahāraniṣedhataḥ // HSvs_[6.1]435 //
GR12hsasvrpu:952: (2) arthakriyākāritva se kṣaṇikavāda kī siddhi nahīṃ
GR12hsasvrpu:955: arthakriyā yato 'sau vā tadanyā vā dvayī gatiḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:956: tattve na tatra sāmarthyam anyatas tatsamudbhavāt // HSvs_[6.2]438 //
GR12hsasvrpu:958: na ca nāśe 'pi sadyuktyā taddhetos tatsamudbhavāt // HSvs_[6.2]439 //
GR12hsasvrpu:960: tato 'nyabhāva evaitan nāsau nyāyyo dalaṃ vinā // HSvs_[6.2]440 //
GR12hsasvrpu:961: nāsat sat jāyate yasmād anyasattvasthitāv api /
GR12hsasvrpu:962: tasyaiva tu tathābhāve nanv asiddho 'nvayaḥ katham // HSvs_[6.2]441 //
GR12hsasvrpu:963: bhūtir yaiṣāṃ kriyā soktā na cāsau yujyate kvacit /
GR12hsasvrpu:965: na cātītasya sāmarthyaṃ tasyām iti nidarśitam /
GR12hsasvrpu:966: na cānyo laukikaḥ kaścic chabdārtho 'tretyayuktimat // HSvs_[6.2]443 //
GR12hsasvrpu:967: (3) rūparūpāntaraṇa se kṣaṇikavāda kī siddhi nahīṃ
GR12hsasvrpu:971: pariṇāmaḥ pramāsiddhaḥ iṣṭaś ca khalu paṇḍitaiḥ // HSvs_[6.3]445 //
GR12hsasvrpu:973: etat tad eva na bhavaty ato 'nyatve dhruvo 'nvayaḥ // HSvs_[6.3]446 //
GR12hsasvrpu:974: tad eva na bhavaty etat tac ca na bhavatīti ca /
GR12hsasvrpu:975: viruddhaṃ hanta kiṃcānyad ādimat tat prasajyate // HSvs_[6.3]447 //
GR12hsasvrpu:976: kṣīranāśaś ca dadhy eva yad dṛṣṭaṃ gorasānvitam /
GR12hsasvrpu:977: na tu tailādyataḥ siddha pariṇamo 'nvayāvahaḥ // HSvs_[6.3]448 //
GR12hsasvrpu:978: nāsat sajjāyate jātu sac cāsat sarvathaiva hi /
GR12hsasvrpu:980: nityetaradato nyāyāt tat tathābhāvato hi tat /
GR12hsasvrpu:982: (4)antatogāmī nāśa se kṣaṇikavāda kī siddhi nahīṃ
GR12hsasvrpu:984: tasyaiva tatsvabhāvatvāt yujyate na kadācana // HSvs_[6.4]451 //
GR12hsasvrpu:989: etad apy asad eveti sadṛśo bhinna eva yat /
GR12hsasvrpu:990: bhedāgrahe kathaṃ tasya tatsvabhāvatvato grahaḥ // HSvs_[6.4]454 //
GR12hsasvrpu:991: tadarthaniyato 'sau yad bhedam anyāgrahād hi tat /
GR12hsasvrpu:992: na gṛhṇātīti cet tulyaḥ so 'pareṇa kuto gatiḥ // HSvs_[6.4]455 //
GR12hsasvrpu:993: tathāgater abhāve ca vacas tuccham idaṃ nanu /
GR12hsasvrpu:996: anvayi jñānam eṣṭavyaṃ sarvaṃ tat kṣaṇikaṃ kutaḥ // HSvs_[6.4]457 //
GR12hsasvrpu:997: jñānena gṛhyate cārtho na cāpi paradarśane /
GR12hsasvrpu:998: tadabhāve tu tadbhāvāt kadācid api tattvataḥ // HSvs_[6.4]458 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1000: tadā tat tasya jānāti kṣaṇikatvaṃ kathaṃ nanu // HSvs_[6.4]459 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1002: yathā nīlādi tādrūpyān naitan mithyātvasaṃśayāt // HSvs_[6.4]460 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1006: sarvam evāviśeṣeṇa vijñānaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ yataḥ // HSvs_[6.4]462 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1007: tathā citrasvabhāvatvān na cārthasya na yujyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:1009: (5) kṣaṇikavāda tathā vijñānavāda ke pratipādana kā eka saṃbhava āśayaviśeṣa
GR12hsasvrpu:1010: anye tv abhidadhaty evam etad āsthānivṛttaye /
GR12hsasvrpu:1011: kṣaṇikaṃ sarvam eveti buddhenoktaṃ na tattvataḥ // HSvs_[6.5]464 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1013: vineyān kāṃścid āśritya yad vā tad deśanārhataḥ // HSvs_[6.5]465 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1014: na caitad api na nyāyyaṃ yato buddho mahāmuniḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1015: suvaidyavad vinā kāryaṃ dravyāsatyaṃ na bhāṣate // HSvs_[6.5]466 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1017: bruvate śūnyam anye tu sarvam eva vicakṣaṇāḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1018: na nityaṃ nāpy anityaṃ yad vastu yuktyopapadyate // HSvs_[6.6]467 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1020: anityam api cotpāda-vyayābhāvān na jātucit // HSvs_[6.6]468 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1023: atrāpy abhidadhaty anye kim itthaṃ tattvasādhanam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1024: pramāṇaṃ vidyate kiñcid āhosvicchūnyam eva hi // HSvs_[6.6]470 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1025: śūnyaṃ cet susthitaṃ tattvam asti cec chūnyatā katham /
GR12hsasvrpu:1026: tasyaiva nanu sadbhāvād iti samyag vicintyatām // HSvs_[6.6]471 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1028: anyathā neti suvyaktam idam īśvaraceṣṭitam // HSvs_[6.6]472 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1029: uktaṃ vihāya mānaṃ cec chūnyatāny asya vastunaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1030: śūnyatve pratipādyasya nanu vyarthaḥ pariśramaḥ // HSvs_[6.6]473 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1033: yāvatām asti tanmānaṃ pratipādyās tathā ca ye /
GR12hsasvrpu:1034: santi te sarva eveti prabhūtānām aśūnyatā // HSvs_[6.6]475 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1036: abhiprāyata ity ukto lakṣyate tattvavedinā // HSvs_[6.6]476 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1039: anye tv āhur anādy eva jīvājīvātmakaṃ jagat /
GR12hsasvrpu:1043: payovato na dadhyatti na payo 'tti dadhivrataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1044: agorasavrato nobhe tasmāt tattvaṃ trayātmakam // HSvs_[7.1]479 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1045: atrāpy abhidadhaty anye viruddhaṃ hi mithastrayam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1046: ekatraivaikadā naitad ghaṭāṃ prāñcati jātucid // HSvs_[7.1]480 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1048: dhrauvyaṃ cobhayaśūnyaṃ yad ekadaikatra tat katham // HSvs_[7.1]481 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1050: tadapy asāmprataṃ yat tad vāsanāhetukaṃ matam // HSvs_[7.1]482 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1051: kiñca syādvādino naiva yujyate niścayaḥ kvacit /
GR12hsasvrpu:1052: svatantrāpekṣayā tasya na mānaṃ mānam eva yat // HSvs_[7.1]483 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1053: saṃsāry api na saṃsārī mukto 'pi na sa eva hi /
GR12hsasvrpu:1056: svarṇān na vānya eveti na viruddhaṃ mithastrayam // HSvs_[7.1]485 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1057: na cotpādavyayau na sto dhrauvyavat taddhiyā gateḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1058: nāstitve tu tayor dhrauvyaṃ tattvato 'stīti na pramā // HSvs_[7.1]486 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1059: na nāsti dhrauvyam apy evam avigānena tadgateḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1060: asyāś ca bhrāntatāyāṃ na jagaty abhrāntatāgatiḥ // HSvs_[7.1]487 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1064: anyathā tritayābhāva ekadaikatra kiṃ na tat // HSvs_[7.1]489 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1066: nyāyyaṃ bhinnanimittatvāt tadabhede na yujyate // HSvs_[7.1]490 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1067: iṣyate ca parair mohāt tat kṣaṇasthitidharmiṇi /
GR12hsasvrpu:1068: abhāve 'nyatam asyāpi tatra tattvaṃ na yad bhavet // HSvs_[7.1]491 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1069: bhāvamātraṃ tad iṣṭaṃ cet tad itthaṃ nirviśeṣaṇam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1070: kṣaṇasthitisvabhāvatvaṃ na hy utpādavyayau vinā // HSvs_[7.1]492 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1071: taditthaṃ bhūtam eveti drāgnabhasto na jātucit /
GR12hsasvrpu:1072: bhūtvābhāvaś ca nāśo 'pi tad eveti na laukikam // HSvs_[7.1]493 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1074: tadayuktaṃ yataś citrā sā na jātvanibandhanā // HSvs_[7.1]494 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1077: na mānaṃ mānam eveti sarvathāniścayaś ca yaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1078: ukto na yujyate so 'pi yad ekāntanibandhanaḥ // HSvs_[7.1]496 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1079: mānaṃ tanmānam eveti pratyakṣaṃ laiṅgikaṃ na tu /
GR12hsasvrpu:1080: tat tac cen mānam eveti syāt tadbhāvādṛte katham // HSvs_[7.1]497 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1082: svasattvāsattvavannyāyān na ca nāsty eva tatra tat // HSvs_[7.1]498 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1083: parikalpitam etac cen na tv itthaṃ tattvato na tat /
GR12hsasvrpu:1084: tataḥ ka iha doṣaś cen na tu tadbhāvasaṃgatiḥ // HSvs_[7.1]499 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1086: syādvādino niyogena yujyate niścayaḥ paraḥ // HSvs_[7.1]500 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1087: etena sarvam eveti yad uktaṃ tan nirākṛtam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1088: śiṣyavyutpattaye kiñcit tathāpy aparam ucyate // HSvs_[7.1]501 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1089: saṃsārī cet sa eveti kathaṃ muktasya saṃbhavaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1090: mukto 'pi cet sa eveti vyapadeśo 'nibandhanaḥ // HSvs_[7.1]502 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1091: saṃsārād vipramukto yan mukta ity abhidhīyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:1094: dravyaparyāyavad vastu balād eva prasiddhyati // HSvs_[7.1]504 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1095: lajjate bālyacaritair bāla eva na cāpi yat /
GR12hsasvrpu:1096: yuvā na lajjate cānyas tair āyatyaiva ceṣṭate // HSvs_[7.1]505 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1097: yuvaiva na ca vṛddho 'pi nānyārthaṃ ceṣṭanaṃ ca tat /
GR12hsasvrpu:1103: anyonyam iti yad bhedaṃ vyāptiś cāha viparyayam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1106: vyasanaṃ dhījaḍatvaṃ vā prakāśayati kevalam // HSvs_[7.1]510 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1107: nyāyāt khalu virodho yaḥ sa virodha ihocyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:1110: tad vā tena vinirmuktaṃ kevalaṃ gamyate kvacit // HSvs_[7.1]512 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1111: tato 'sat tat tathā nyāyād ekaṃ cobhayasiddhitaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1114: niyatatvād viviktasya bhedādeś cāpy asaṃbhavāt // HSvs_[7.1]514 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1116: kevalo 'sti yatas tena kutas tatra vikalpanam // HSvs_[7.1]515 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1117: yenākāreṇa bhedaḥ kiṃ tenāsāv eva vā dvayam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1118: asattvāt kevalasyeha sataś ca kathitatvataḥ // HSvs_[7.1]516 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1119: yataś ca tat pramāṇena gamyate hy ubhayātmakam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1121: evaṃ hy ubhayadoṣādi-doṣā api na dūṣaṇam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1127: yannivṛttau na yasyeha nivṛttis tat tato yataḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1128: bhinnaṃ niyamato dṛṣṭaṃ yathā karkaḥ kramelakāt // HSvs_[7.1]521 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1129: nivartate ca paryāyo na tu dravyaṃ tato na saḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1131: pratikṣiptaṃ ca yad bhedā-bhedapakṣo 'nya eva hi /
GR12hsasvrpu:1133: jātyantarātmakaṃ cainaṃ doṣās te samiyuḥ katham /
GR12hsasvrpu:1134: bhedābhede ca ye 'tyantaṃ jātibhinne vyavasthitāḥ // HSvs_[7.1]524 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1135: kiñcin nivartate 'vaśyaṃ tasyāpy anyat tathā na yat /
GR12hsasvrpu:1136: atas tadbheda evātra nivṛttyādyanyathā katham // HSvs_[7.1]525 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1138: abhinnadeśas tasyeti yat tadvyāptyā tathocyate // HSvs_[7.1]526 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1142: tasyaiva hi tathābhāvaḥ sūkṣmabuddhyā vicintyatām // HSvs_[7.1]528 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1143: tasyaiva tu tathābhāve tad eva hi yatas tathā /
GR12hsasvrpu:1144: bhavatyato na doṣo naḥ kaścid apy upapadyate // HSvs_[7.1]529 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1148: jātyantarātmakaṃ vastu nityānityaṃ yato matam // HSvs_[7.1]531 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1150: iyaṃ ca lokasiddhaiva tad evedam iti kṣitau // HSvs_[7.1]532 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1151: na yujyate ca sannyāyād ṛte tatpariṇāmitām /
GR12hsasvrpu:1153: ekāntaikye na nānā yan nānātve caikam apy adaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1154: ataḥ kathaṃ nu tadbhāvaḥ tadetadubhayātmakam // HSvs_[7.1]534 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1156: pramātur api tadbhāvāt yujyate mukhyavṛttitaḥ // HSvs_[7.1]535 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1158: tad iheti prasaṃgena tad evedam ayogataḥ // HSvs_[7.1]536 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1160: etad dvayāgrahe yuktaṃ na ca sādṛśyakalpanam // HSvs_[7.1]537 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1161: na ca bhrāntāpi sadbādhā-'bhāvād eva kadācana /
GR12hsasvrpu:1163: nānā yogī vijānātya-nānā nety atra na pramā /
GR12hsasvrpu:1166: iyaṃ saṃlakṣyate sāpi tadābhāsā na saiva hi // HSvs_[7.1]540 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1168: pratyakṣaṃ tadvad eveyaṃ pramāṇam avagamyatām // HSvs_[7.1]541 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1170: etad balāt tataḥ siddhaṃ nityānityādi vastunaḥ // HSvs_[7.1]542 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1174: sato yad bhedakaṃ nānyat tac ca tanmātram eva hi // HSvs_[8.1]543 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1176: saṃkīrṇam iva mātrābhir bhinnābhir abhimanyate // HSvs_[8.1]544 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1179: atrāpy evaṃ vadanty anye avidyā na sataḥ pṛthak /
GR12hsasvrpu:1180: tac ca tanmātram eveti bhedābhāso 'nibandhanaḥ // HSvs_[8.1]546 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1182: pramāṇam antareṇaitad avagantuṃ na śakyate // HSvs_[8.1]547 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1186: tatsaṃśayādiyogāc ca pratītyā ca vicintyatām // HSvs_[8.1]549 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1188: advaitadeśanā śāstre nirdiṣṭā na tu tattvataḥ // HSvs_[8.1]550 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1194: (1)mokṣa kī saṃbhāvanā tathā mokṣa ke sādhana
GR12hsasvrpu:1195: anye punar vadanty evaṃ mokṣa eva na vidyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:1196: upāyābhāvataḥ kiṃ vā na sadā sarvadehinām // HSvs_[9.1]553 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1199: tasyaiva citrarūpatvāt tat tatheti na yujyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:1200: utkṛṣṭā yā sthitis tasya yaj jātānekaśaḥ kila // HSvs_[9.1]555 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1204: duḥkhāntakṛt sukhārambhaḥ paryāyās tasya kīrtitāḥ // HSvs_[9.1]557 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1208: nirbhidya śubhabhāvena kadācit kaścid eva hi // HSvs_[9.1]559 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1211: sa paśyaty asya yad rūpaṃ bhāvato buddhicakṣuṣā /
GR12hsasvrpu:1214: bhāvagarbhaṃ yathābhāvaṃ paraṃ saṃvegam āśritaḥ // HSvs_[9.1]562 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1216: kleśāya kevalaṃ puṃsām aho bhīmo mahodadhiḥ // HSvs_[9.1]563 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1222: tad arthaṃ ceṣṭate nityaṃ viśuddhātmā yathāgamam // HSvs_[9.1]566 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1227: tataś ca duṣkaraṃ tan na samyag ālocyate yadā /
GR12hsasvrpu:1230: kaṣṭe 'py upakrame dhīraḥ samyak prītyā pravartate // HSvs_[9.1]570 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1234: śuddhaṃ cāritram āsādya kevalaṃ labhate kramāt // HSvs_[9.1]572 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1236: jñānayogāt kṣayaṃ kṛtvā mokṣam āpnoti śāśvatam // HSvs_[9.1]573 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1237: jñānayogas tapaḥ śuddham ity ādi yad udīritam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1240: śaileśīsaṃjñitaṃ sthairyaṃ tato muktir asaṃśayam // HSvs_[9.1]575 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1242: akṣayo 'pratipātitvāt sadā muktau tathā sthiteḥ // HSvs_[9.1]576 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1244: siddha ukto yataḥ śāstre na cāritrī na cetaraḥ // HSvs_[9.1]577 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1246: samayātikrame yadvat siddhabhāvaś ca tatra vai // HSvs_[9.1]578 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1247: jñānayogād ato muktir iti samyag vyavasthitam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1248: tantrāntarānurodhena gītaṃ cetthaṃ na doṣakṛt // HSvs_[9.1]579 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1251: atrāpy abhidadhaty anye sarvajño naiva vidyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:1254: liṅgam apy avinābhāvi tena kiñcin na vidyate // HSvs_[10.1]581 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1262: dharmādharmaparijñātā kim arthaṃ kalpyate naraḥ // HSvs_[10.1]585 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1266: antarvedyāṃ tu yad dattam iṣṭaṃ tad abhidhīyate // HSvs_[10.1]587 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1268: annapradānam ity etat pūrttam ity abhidhīyate // HSvs_[10.1]588 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1269: ato 'pi śuklaṃ yad vṛttaṃ nirīhasya mahātmanaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1270: dhyānādi mokṣaphaladaṃ śreyas tad abhidhīyate // HSvs_[10.1]589 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1272: atīndriyārthadraṣṭā tan nāsti kiñcit prayojanam // HSvs_[10.1]590 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1275: sarvārthaviṣayaṃ tac cet pratyakṣaṃ tan niṣedhakṛt /
GR12hsasvrpu:1276: abhāvaḥ katham etasya na ced atrāpy adaḥ samam // HSvs_[10.1]592 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1278: kasyacit sarva eveti nānumānaṃ na vidyate // HSvs_[10.1]593 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1279: āgamād api tatsiddhir yad asau codanāphalam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1280: prāmāṇyaṃ ca svatas tasya nityatvam ca śruter iva // HSvs_[10.1]594 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1282: upamānyagrahe tatra na cānyatrāpi cānyathā // HSvs_[10.1]595 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1288: vihāya gamyate samyak kuta etad vicintyatām // HSvs_[10.1]598 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1296: tatrānyatrāpy ataḥ śaṅkā viduṣo na nivartate // HSvs_[10.1]602 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1298: evaṃ ca kṛtvā sādhv etat kīrtitaṃ dharmakīrtinā // HSvs_[10.1]603 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1300: na vedayati vedo 'pi vedārthasya gatiḥ kutaḥ // HSvs_[10.1]604 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1302: khādet śvamāṃsam ity eṣa nārtha ity atra kā pramā // HSvs_[10.1]605 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1304: svata eva pramāṇaṃ na kiñcid atrāpi vidyate // HSvs_[10.1]606 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1306: tathā hīndīvare dīpaḥ prakāśayati raktatām // HSvs_[10.1]607 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1309: sādhur na veti saṅketo na cāśaṅkā nivartate /
GR12hsasvrpu:1316: jaiminyāder na tulyaṃ kiṃ vacanenāpareṇa vaḥ // HSvs_[10.1]612 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1317: eṣa sthāṇur ayaṃ mārga iti vaktīha kaścana /
GR12hsasvrpu:1318: anyaḥ svayaṃ bravīmīti tayor bhedaḥ parīkṣyatām // HSvs_[10.1]613 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1322: apauruṣeyam iṣṭaṃ vo vaco dravyavyapekṣayā // HSvs_[10.1]615 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1325: pāpād atredṛśī buddhir na puṇyād iti na pramā /
GR12hsasvrpu:1326: na loko hi vigānatvāt tadbahutvādyaniściteḥ // HSvs_[10.1]617 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1328: mānasaṃkhyāvirodhāc ca katham ittham idaṃ nanu // HSvs_[10.1]618 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1334: smaryate ca vigānena hantehāpy aṣṭakādayaḥ // HSvs_[10.1]621 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1337: gauravāpādanārthaṃ ca tathā syād anivedanam // HSvs_[10.1]622 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1338: mantrādīnāṃ ca sāmarthyaṃ śābarāṇām api sphuṭam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1339: pratītaṃ sarvaloke 'pi na cāpy avyabhicāri tat // HSvs_[10.1]623 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1340: vede 'pi paṭhyate hy eṣa mahātmā tatra tatra yat /
GR12hsasvrpu:1341: sa ca mānamato 'py asyāsattvaṃ vaktuṃ na yujyate // HSvs_[10.1]624 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1343: asākṣāddarśinas tatra rūpe 'ndhasy eva sarvathā // HSvs_[10.1]625 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1347: atrāpi prājña ity anya ittham āha subhāṣitam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1348: iṣṭo 'yam arthaḥ śakyeta jñātuṃ so 'tiśayo yadi // HSvs_[10.2]627 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1349: ayam evaṃ na vety anya-doṣo nirdoṣatāpi vā /
GR12hsasvrpu:1350: durlabhatvāt pramāṇānāṃ durbodhety apare viduḥ // HSvs_[10.2]628 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1351: atrāpi bruvate vṛddhāḥ siddham avyabhicāry api /
GR12hsasvrpu:1354: viśeṣajñānam apy evaṃ tadvad abhyāsato na kim // HSvs_[10.2]630 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1356: tatsiddhau jñāyate prājñais tasyātiśaya ity api // HSvs_[10.2]631 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1359: na cāsyādarśane 'py adya sāmrājyasy eva nāstitā /
GR12hsasvrpu:1360: saṃbhavo nyāyayuktas tu pūrvam eva nidarśitaḥ // HSvs_[10.2]633 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1363: evaṃ tatrāpi tadbhāve na virodho 'sti kaścana /
GR12hsasvrpu:1367: vastusthityāpi tat tādṛg na visaṃvādakaṃ bhavet /
GR12hsasvrpu:1368: yathottaraṃ tathā dṛṣṭer iti caitan na sāṃpratam // HSvs_[10.2]637 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1369: siddhyet pramāṇaṃ yady evam apramāṇam atheha kim /
GR12hsasvrpu:1370: na hy ekaṃ nāsti satyārthaṃ puruṣe bahubhāṣiṇi // HSvs_[10.2]638 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1371: yata ekaṃ na satyārthaṃ kintu sarvaṃ yathāśrutam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1372: yatrāgame pramāṇaṃ sa iṣyate paṇḍitair janaiḥ // HSvs_[10.2]639 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1373: ātmā nāmī pṛthak karma tatsaṃyogād bhavo 'nyathā /
GR12hsasvrpu:1374: muktir hiṃsādayo mukhyās tannivṛttiḥ sasādhanā // HSvs_[10.2]640 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1376: yatredaṃ yujyate sarvaṃ yogivyaktaṃ sa āgamaḥ // HSvs_[10.2]641 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1377: adhikāry api cāsyeha svayam ajño 'pi yaḥ pumān /
GR12hsasvrpu:1384: śabdārthayor na saṃbandho vastusthityeha vidyate // HSvs_[11.1]644 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1388: anyābhāvaniyogāc ca na tadutpattir apy alam // HSvs_[11.1]646 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1390: na syāt pravṛttir artheṣu darśanāntarabhediṣu // HSvs_[11.1]647 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1391: atītājātayor vāpi na ca syād anṛtārthatā /
GR12hsasvrpu:1392: vācaḥ kasyāścid ity eṣā bauddhārthaviṣayā matā // HSvs_[11.1]648 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1393: vācya ittham apohas tu na jātiḥ pāramārthikī /
GR12hsasvrpu:1394: tadayogād vinā bhedaṃ tadanyebhyas tathāsthiteḥ // HSvs_[11.1]649 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1395: sati cāsmin kim anyena śabdāt tadvatpratītitaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1396: tadabhāve na tadvattvaṃ tadbhrāntatvāt tathā na kim // HSvs_[11.1]650 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1397: abhrāntajātivāde tu na daṇḍād daṇḍivad gatiḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1398: tadvaty ubhayasāṅkarye na bhedād vo 'pi tādṛśam // HSvs_[11.1]651 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1400: asti śabdārthayor yogas tatpratītyāditas tataḥ // HSvs_[11.1]652 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1403: śabdāt tadvāsanābodho vikalpasya tato hi yat /
GR12hsasvrpu:1404: tad ittham ucyate 'smābhir na tatas tadasiddhitaḥ // HSvs_[11.1]654 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1405: viśiṣṭaṃ vāsanājanma bodhas tac ca na jātucit /
GR12hsasvrpu:1406: anyatas tulyakālāder viśeṣo 'nyasya no yataḥ // HSvs_[11.1]655 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1407: niṣpannatvād asattvāc ca dvābhyām anyodayo na saḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1409: na hy uktavat svahetos tu syāc ca nāśaḥ sahetukaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1410: itthaṃ prakalpane nyāyād ata eva na yuktimat // HSvs_[11.1]657 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1412: na doṣā no na cānye 'pi tadbhedād hetubhedataḥ // HSvs_[11.1]658 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1416: pratyākhyātaṃ hi śabdānām iti samyag vicintyatām // HSvs_[11.1]660 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1417: anyadoṣo yad anyasya yuktyā yukto na jātucit /
GR12hsasvrpu:1418: vaktyavarṇaṃ na buddhānāṃ bhikṣvādiḥ śabarādivat // HSvs_[11.1]661 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1422: tatkartṛtvena saphalaṃ yogināṃ tu na vidyate // HSvs_[11.1]663 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1424: vācyasya ca tathānyatra nāgo 'sya samaye 'pi hi // HSvs_[11.1]664 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1425: anantadharmakaṃ vastu taddharmaḥ kaścid eva ca /
GR12hsasvrpu:1426: vācyo na sarva eveti tataś caitan na bādhakam // HSvs_[11.1]665 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1428: śabdāt pratyeti bhinnākṣaḥ na tu pratyakṣam īkṣate // HSvs_[11.1]666 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1434: asattvād vastubhedena buddhyā tasyāpi bodhataḥ // HSvs_[11.1]669 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1436: apoho yan na saṃskāro na ca kṣaṇika iṣyate // HSvs_[11.1]670 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1437: evaṃ ca vastunas tattvaṃ hanta śāstrād aniścitam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1438: tadabhāve ca suvyaktaṃ tad etat tuṣakhaṇḍanam // HSvs_[11.1]671 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1441: (2) jñāna tathā kiryā ke bīca prādhānya-aprādhānya kā praśna
GR12hsasvrpu:1442: jñānād eva niyogena siddhim icchanti kecana /
GR12hsasvrpu:1443: anye kriyāta eveti dvābhyām anye vicakṣaṇāḥ // HSvs_[11.2]673 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1444: jñānaṃ hi phaladaṃ puṃsāṃ na kiryā phaladā matā /
GR12hsasvrpu:1446: jñānahīnāś ca yal loke dṛśyante hi mahākriyāḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1448: jñānavantaś ca tadvīryāt tatra tatra svakarmaṇi /
GR12hsasvrpu:1450: kevalajñānabhāve ca muktir apy anyathā na yat /
GR12hsasvrpu:1451: kriyayāvato 'pi yatnena tasmāt jñānād asau matā // HSvs_[11.2]677 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1452: kriyaiva phaladā puṃsāṃ na jñānaṃ phaladaṃ matam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1453: yataḥ strībhakṣyabhogajño na jñānāt sukhino bhavet // HSvs_[11.2]678 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1454: kriyāhīnāś ca yal loke dṛśyante jñānino 'pi hi /
GR12hsasvrpu:1457: mūrkhā api hi bhūyāṃso vipaścitsvāmino 'naghāḥ // HSvs_[11.2]680 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1459: nānyathā kevalitve 'pi tad asau tannibandhanā // HSvs_[11.2]681 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1461: tayor api ca tadbhāvaḥ paramārthena nānyathā // HSvs_[11.2]682 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1462: sādhyam arthaṃ parijñāya yadi samyak pravartate /
GR12hsasvrpu:1463: tatas tat sādhayatv eva tathā cāha bṛhaspatiḥ // HSvs_[11.2]683 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1465: tadaprāptāv upāyatvaṃ na tasyā upapadyate // HSvs_[11.2]684 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1466: asādhyārambhiṇas tena samyag jñānaṃ na jātucit /
GR12hsasvrpu:1468: ata evāgamajñasya yā kriyā sā kriyocyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:1469: āgamajño 'pi yas tasyāṃ yathāśakti pravartate // HSvs_[11.2]686 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1473: mālatīgandhagaṇavid darbhe na ramate hy aliḥ // HSvs_[11.2]688 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1475: tadbhāva eva tadbhāvāt tadabhāve 'py abhāvataḥ // HSvs_[11.2]689 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1476: na viviktaṃ dvayaṃ samyag etad anyair apīṣyate /
GR12hsasvrpu:1478: baṭharaś ca tapasvī ca śūraś cāpy akṛtavraṇaḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1479: madyapā strī satītvaṃ ca rājan na śraddadhāmy aham // HSvs_[11.2]691 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1482: nākarmaṇaḥ kvacij janma yathoktaṃ pūrvasūribhiḥ // HSvs_[11.3]692 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1484: karmabīje tathā dagdhe na rohati bhavāṅkuraḥ // HSvs_[11.3]693 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1486: tadabhāve ca niḥśeṣa-duḥkhābhāvaḥ sadaiva hi // HSvs_[11.3]694 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1492: kṣīṇasaṅgā mahātmānas te sadā sukham āsate // HSvs_[11.3]697 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1493: etā vārtā upaśrutya bhāvayan buddhimān naraḥ /
GR12hsasvrpu:1497: kṛtvā prakaraṇam etad yad avāptaṃ kiñcid iha mayā kuśalam /
GR12hsasvrpu:1498: bhavavirahabījam anaghaṃ labhatāṃ bhavyo janas tena // HSvs_[11.4]700 //
GR12hsasvrpu:1499: yaṃ buddhaṃ bodhayantaḥ śikhijalamarutas tuṣṭuvur lokavṛttyai jñānaṃ yatrodapādi pratihatabhuvanālokavandhyatvahetu /
GR12hsasvrpu:1500: sarvaprāṇisvabhāṣāpariṇatisubhagaṃ kauśalaṃ yasya vācāṃ tasmin devādhideve bhagavati bhavatādhīyatāṃ bhaktirāgaḥ // HSvs_[11.4]701 //
